name: Light Whisp
description:
Developed by: Calvin Le and Joshua Soran

Retro Space Game is a collaborative student project developed for Lawrence Technological University's MCS3033 course.

Play as a will-o-wisp and traverse through various floors of a seemingly desolate castle. Watch out of traps and enemies along the way!

DotA 2 sound assets were used in the making of this video game.

Features:

* 5 Floors with progressive difficulty.

* Hand drawn NPCs and VFX!

* Multiple NPC mechanics and Traps.

* Dynamic Shadows and scripted physics engine.

How To Play:

- Use WASD to move.

- Press Right Mouse Button to dash.

- Press Space to jump (double-tap to double jump!)

- You can wall jump by positioning against the wall and holding down the opposite directional key while pressing space.
